issue_title: [Enhancement] Add logging module for debugging file operations
summary: Add debug-level logging to storage.py for file operations visibility

changes.description: Added logging import and logger, added debug logs to load(), save(), and _ensure_parent_directory()
Added regression tests to verify logging functionality

acceptance_criteria_met: storage.py imports logging module and creates logger
load() method logs debug level with file size
save() method logs debug for atomic write steps
Logging does not affect existing tests
